medical_history.chief_complaint: 10 days without a bowel movement or flatus, nausea and vomiting
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient was in his usual state of health until 10 days prior to admission. At that time, he had a dark colored bowel movement. Since then, he has gone 10 days without a bowel movement or flatus, with diffuse abdominal discomfort, worsening after eating. He has had very little oral intake for the last 5 days, except for some water. Nausea and vomiting developed this morning, leading to his presentation to the Emergency Department. Post bowel movement, the patient felt improved.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Angina, Gout, Hypothyroidism, Hypertension, COPD, History of Alcohol use, Benign Prostatic Hyperplasia, Depression
